programme.title: Elvis

programme.title: The Wall UK S4 - EP 2
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico - EP 1
programme.desc: Burritos, nachos, fajitas? Not Mexican, they were invented by the USA. The real Mexican culinary experience is a much broader, surprising and exciting proposition. This is the country that invented chocolate, still eats recipes from thousands of years ago and is home to the most dangerous fruit in the world.

programme.title: Planet Earth III - EP 3
programme.desc: In the baked Namib desert, a pair of ostriches raise their family in the searing heat to keep them safe from predators - but time is ticking as the chicks begin to hatch. Outside of the egg, the newborns won't survive long in these temperatures, but not all of the clutch hatch at once. For the whole brood to survive, the parents need to time their departure perfectly, but tragically they are forced to leave behind a single unhatched egg.

programme.desc: Jian Hong gives birth to a boy, and Tarzan names him Yi Xin. He doesn't want Yi Xin to call him "Father" but Jian Hong refuses. Time passes and Yi Xin is now 8 years old. A man watches him from a distance as he plays on the streets. The man is none other than Xiao Bei, who has been missing for 10 years.

programme.title: Together - EP 32
programme.desc: Hui Min is working on a murder case and goes to a secluded area to look for witnesses. She gets harassed by them but is fortunately rescued by a beggar. She finds him familiar and returns back to look for him. As it turns out, she discovers that the bedraggled man is really Xiao Bei.

programme.title: An Ode To Life - EP 13
programme.desc: Ah Zhi is a hapless and simple girl who's in love with an artist Qiming. Deceived by her mother, she is forced to marry into a rich family and is shocked to find out that her husband Wenshou suffers from autism. Not only does Ah Zhi has to take care of her husband, she also has to contend with the scheming machinations of her husband's siblings, as they seek to discredit her; and the distrust of her mother-in-law who believes she brings ill luck to the family.

programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - MAAVEERAN(TAMIL DUBBED
programme.desc: Raghuveer murders Indira's father and blames Harsha. When Harsha sets out to his clear his name, he recalls his previous life from 400 years ago and his connection to them.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Movie Contd - MAAVEERAN(TAMIL DUBBED
programme.desc: Raghuveer murders Indira's father and blames Harsha. When Harsha sets out to his clear his name, he recalls his previous life from 400 years ago and his connection to them.

programme.title: RAMAYANAM
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Sundari
programme.desc: Sundari is an ambitious girl whose ultimate goal is to become an IAS officer. Follow her inspiring journey filled with overwhelming odds and beautiful moments of joy as she strives to achieve her dream, while learning to embrace and love her appearance.

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her family’s happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Ranjani
programme.desc: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: Mr. Manaivi
programme.desc: Anjali and Vicky are two different individuals who approaches life differently, they both meet each other at a point where completely interesting lead begins.

programme.title: Malar - Serial
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malar's ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner & a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destiny's plan for them?

programme.title: Quand Pearl Harbor Changea Le Destin De La France
programme.desc: 1941. The attack on Pearl Harbor gave General de Gaulle and his movement the legitimacy so lacking in the early days. It was in Oceania that France Libre became a territorial reality and that de Gaulle was recognised as its leader by the Americans.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 17
programme.desc: Abalone, a shellfish that has become rare and prestigious, but one that has been in decline since the 1990s, victim of overfishing and a bacterium. Scientists and marine professionals are working together to try to restore the species: in the Finistere, and unique in Europe, abalone is now being farmed.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 3
programme.desc: Forests react to climate change and slowly adapt to it. Biologist Marie-Eve Roy and researcher Sylvain Delagrange look at the future of the sugar maple and document how it is adapting to global warming.

programme.title: Thiaroye 44
programme.desc: What happened on 1 December 1944 at the Thiaroye military camp in Senegal? West African soldiers, only just repatriated from the front, came under fire from French machine guns. Nearly 80 years later, three young artists from this Dakar suburb want to understand the reasons behind the massacre.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 21
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 12
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 27
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 26
programme.desc: Mr Agrotek uses Lucie to convince Tom to reveal where Lila is. Paquet believes Stef has run away and takes measures to find him, which irritates Alex who would like the same attention from his father.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Mamma En Chef - EP 10
programme.desc: Erich Preach introduces us to Seetha, who in turn invites us to discover her homeland, Sri Lanka. So, with everyone in traditional dress, it's time to prepare naan bread to accompany the classic ''butter chicken''.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 8
programme.desc: Through its reporters spread across the whole of Canada and the four corners of the world, the magazine ''Le Point'' gives a true testimony of what is happening in the major areas of Canada, Europe, Asia, Africa, the USA and Latin America.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Revolution Sida
programme.desc: Artists, political leaders, researchers and witnesses give a frosty assessment of political and social dysfunctions caused by AIDS, despite outstanding scientific progress. An uncompromising look at what this disease provoked and still inflicts in South Africa, China, Russia or Thailand.

programme.title: Linge Sale
programme.desc: Arthur's solitary life is peaceful and well-organised. The arrival of his younger brother Theo, who he hasn't seen for ages, disturbs his orderly existence and throws him completely off balance.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 7
programme.desc: Henri spends a somewhat stormy day with his patients. An unexpected development in the investigation changes everyone's thinking. Henri's certainties begin to fall like dominoes: Anne wasn't telling him everything. Simone continues to try to support him, despite seeing her own personal life crumble around her.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 8
programme.desc: Henri tries to help his patient Karim who has lost control over the voices in his head, and meets one of Anne's former patients, Nina. Julia, Anne's sister, calls Simone with a secret about her sister. Will this new piece of the puzzle enable Simone to wrap up her investigation?

programme.title: Movie - Naadodigal
programme.desc: Karunakaran, Chandran and Paandi fight tooth and nail to unite their friend Saravanan with Prabha, but an unfortunate incident changes the trio's lives for the worse.

programme.title: Movie - Aalavanthan
programme.desc: Nandu and Vijay are brothers who were abused by their stepmother during their younger days. Nandu, who is mentally ill, decides to kill Vijay's fiancee as he visualizes her as his stepmother.

programme.title: Movie - Thathi Thavuthu Manasu
programme.desc: Three village girls who yearn to taste the big city life get to attend a friend's wedding in Chennai. But their joy comes to a halt when their money is stolen, leaving them stranded.

programme.title: Movie - Theechatti Govindan
programme.desc: Govindan, a police officer, pursues Uday and Raghu, the sons of a corrupt politician, for raping a nun. When he discovers that the two are involved in a robbery too, he tries to gather evidence.

programme.title: Movie - Vigneshwar

programme.title: Movie - Oorai Therinjukitten
programme.desc: Pandiyan, who loses his mother at a young age, becomes a conman to educate his sister. However, his life turns upside down when he is unable to settle the dowry for his sister's marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Vaitheeswaran
programme.desc: A young boy is killed by an aspiring politician; his upset mother tries to kill herself, but a man tells her that her son will be reborn. She waits for her son in a temple for 30 years; this attracts the curiosity of a doctor who offers to treat her.

programme.title: Movie - Maha Nadigan
programme.desc: Sathya, a junior artiste, manages to secure a chance to play a hero in a movie. As his fame gradually increases, he is ambitious to become the chief minister of the state.

programme.title: Movie - Raja Chinna Roja
programme.desc: Raja, an aspiring actor from a village, relocates to a big city to follow his dream. There, he meets his childhood friend who promises him an acting job, but later learns about his evil intentions.

programme.title: Movie - Thee
programme.desc: Sarathy, an honest cop, arrests an MLA, putting an end to his political career. The MLA kills Sarathy's wife and frames him in a case. Sarathy makes a u-turn in life and becomes a corrupt MLA himself.

programme.title: Movie - Thirudi
programme.desc: Aravind, who is training to be a karate champion, falls in love with Thamarai. However, things take a turn when he is forced to leave for Chennai.

programme.title: Movie - Tholaipaesi
programme.desc: Veda continues his philandering ways even after his marriage to Anita. Things take a turn when she learns that her husband is having an affair with Reema.

programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.desc: Sandhya is fed up of her life that is controlled by her father. She runs away from home, but soon loses her money to Eeshwar. Waiting around for him to pay her back, she falls in love with him.

programme.title: Movie - Unakkagave Vazhukkiren

programme.title: Movie - Pagal Nilavu

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 26
programme.desc: We gather a panel of experts to tackle a nearly impossible question: What truly is the Greatest Premier League Game Ever? Join two ex-footballers, a seasoned commentator, and a top football journalist as they lock horns in a passionate roundtable discussion. The panel revisits iconic moments, dissecting tactics, and legendary performances. Expect banter, bold claims, and maybe even a few surprises, as they strive to settle the debate-or perhaps keep it alive.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 5
programme.desc: Leicester City's Premier League triumph is one of the greatest underdog stories in the history of sport. Wes Morgan and Marc Albrighton recount the pivotal moments that defined their remarkable journey to the title.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Manchester City (MW13) (Live) - EP 130
programme.desc: Manchester City have won just one of their last 21 Premier League away games against Liverpool (D7 L13), beating them 4-1 in February 2021. They’ve not won at Anfield with fans in attendance since May 2003 (2-1).

programme.title: 1-to-11 2024/25 - EP 7
programme.desc: Premier League goalkeeper Asmir Begovic picks his best eleven from players he has shared a pitch with in the Premier League.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs AFC Bournemouth (MW13) - EP 125
programme.desc: Wolves have won their last two Premier League games, as many as they had in their previous 22 combined (D5 L15). They last won three in a row in December 2023

programme.title: Brentford vs Leicester City (MW13) - EP 122
programme.desc: Leicester are unbeaten in their last eight league games against Brentford (W5 D3), since a 3-2 home loss in the second tier in March 1953.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Ipswich Town (MW13) - EP 124
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest and Ipswich have met each other four times in the Premier League - Ipswich won both meetings in 1992-93 as Forest were relegated, while Forest won both games in 1994-95 with the Tractor Boys going down.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Aston Villa (MW13) - EP 127
programme.desc: Aston Villa are winless in their last four Premier League games (D2 L2). They last went five without a win between May and August 2022, while they last did so in the same season in March/April 2022 (both runs under Steven Gerrard).

programme.title: Liverpool vs Manchester City (MW13) - EP 130
programme.desc: Manchester City have won just one of their last 21 Premier League away games against Liverpool (D7 L13), beating them 4-1 in February 2021. They’ve not won at Anfield with fans in attendance since May 2003 (2-1).

programme.title: Manchester United vs Everton (MW13) - EP 128
programme.desc: This is Ruben Amorim’s first home league game in charge of Manchester United. Since the start of last season, the Portuguese has won all 22 of his home league games in charge of Sporting CP by an aggregate score of 72-13.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Fulham (MW13) - EP 129
programme.desc: Tottenham have lost just one of their last 14 Premier League home games against Fulham (W10 D3), a 1-0 loss in March 2013.

programme.desc: This episode features a Fight of the Night contest between strawweights Cheyanne 'The Warrior Princess' Vlismas and Karolina 'The Polish Assassin' Wojcik, both making their debut. This was a 3-round war with one fighter taking home the split decision victory. Bonus coverage includes Rodrique Kena vs. Sifiso Ngcobo.

programme.title: WCCB Carlos Ocampo vs. Mikael Zewski
programme.desc: From the Colisee in Quebec, Canada, Mikael Zewski competes in front of his hometown fans against world-ranked veteran Carlos Ocampo of Mexico, with the WBC Continental Americas Super Welterweight Title on the line. Ocampo is a tough competitor, taking on the best in the world including Errol Spence Jr. for the IBF Welterweight World Championship. Zewski is also no stranger to the big stage, having held several North American and International WBA, IBF, and WBO titles himself.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Marco Antonio Barrera
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of multiple-weight world champions, as Juan Manuel Marquez challenges Marco Antonio Barrera for the WBC super featherweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 1 featuring Kakuryu, Ikioi, Endo and Yutakayama from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: In the season finale of American Ninja Warrior, the top contestants from across the nation compete in the ultimate athletic challenge. programme.title: WCCB Jean Pascal vs. Michael Eifert
programme.desc: In this episode Jean Pascal (36-6-1, 20 KOs) and Michael Eifert (11-1, 4 KOs) battle it out in the main event from Place Bell in Laval, Canada. The contest pits Haitian-Canadian former world champion and a contender from Germany. The pair squares off in this 12 round IBF light heavyweight title eliminator.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated contest featuring two of boxing's greats - Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya. This fight set the record for most pay-per-view buys, as 2.4 million purchases led to over $135 million in revenue. The winner of this closely-contested bout would be WBC light middleweight champion.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husband's career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.desc: Happy finds a cake lying around in the field and decides to eat it. But whose cake is it?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Duggee is having a bad hair day. Can the squirrels help him at all?

programme.desc: The Squirrels are out tobogganing with Duggee when they spot a bird fall from the sky.

programme.desc: Enid the cat is stuck up the tree. How will Duggee and the squirrels get her down?

programme.desc: The squirrels read a super-hero comic and decide they want to be super squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Duggee is making jam, but then his fruit is stolen.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a treasure map inside Duggee's big shiny ruby.

programme.desc: The birds keep eating Duggee's grain, so the squirrels build a scarecrow.

programme.desc: The Squirrels and Duggee go looking for a special leaf, but find something surprising!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Duggee decides to make an omelette, but there's no eggs. Those chickens need to get busy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Duggee is sowing seeds. The squirrels want to grow something too but who will grow what?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: It's a scorcher of a day. Luckily Duggee has a paddling pool. Time for some fun.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Duggee shows the squirrels how to make a paper boat out of newspaper.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: The squirrels hear an echoey voice coming from the top of a castle's spooky tower.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels look for something interesting to share at the clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 19
programme.desc: Duggee introduces the squirrels to Bucky his old rocking horse. Saddle up, squirrels!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 20
programme.desc: Oh dear, poor Norrie is sick. Can the squirrels think of something to cheer her up?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a little worm. It's swallowed a bit too much earth and has the hiccups.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels build a maze out of all the things in Duggee's workshop.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: It's a hot day and Duggee's flowers are looking sad. Some water would perk them up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: Norrie is upset when she sees a leaf fall from the tree, because she thinks it's broken.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 25
programme.desc: Duggee is blowing up balloons for Tino the grumpy artistic mouse's birthday.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels play hide and seek. Duggee counts while the Squirrels hide.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels decide to play Hide and Seek.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing when they notice that there is a sheep in the clubhouse!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: The squirrels are playing when Norrie discovers a spider in the dressing up box.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: Duggee is stroking Enid the cat, and the squirrels want to find animals to stroke as well.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a snowman.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 32
programme.desc: Duggee is painting the clubhouse, and the squirrels ask if they can help out.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 33
programme.desc: It's time for a Spring Clean. Duggee is dusting when a big package arrives for him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 34
programme.desc: The circus has come to town and the Squirrels are excited, but it's a flea circus.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 35
programme.desc: One of the chickens is laying her eggs, and one of the eggs has sprouted legs!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: Duggee's nephew Dudley comes to stay, and causes puppy chaos in the clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Squirrels are interested in a big cardboard box that has arrived for Duggee.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 38
programme.desc: The squirrels are helping Duggee in the garden when they befriend a caterpillar.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 39
programme.desc: It's a beautiful day, and the Squirrels are learning to make sand castles on the beach.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: Duggee decides it's time to teach the Squirrels to play football.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels put on a puppet show for everyone.

programme.desc: Duggee is using his trusty binoculars to do some bird-watching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: Duggee introduces the squirrels to his friend Eugene, the leader of the Big Parade.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: Naughty Monkey causes chaos when he throws his banana skins around!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Tag falls over and bumps his knee. Duggee has his First Aid Badge so he can help Tag.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Duggee has a pot of bubble mixture and he's blowing fantastic bubbles.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2024
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazine's 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show's wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Meet The Press 2024
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. From starting a business to changing careers, getting in and out of debt, creating an unusual income stream, or casting it all aside to start over again... young people reveal the steps they took to make it happen.

programme.title: Marketing.media.money
programme.desc: We see marketing every day, but how we consume it changes with the media. Since it's worth an estimated $1.7 trillion dollars globally it's time take a look at Marketing.Media.Money.

programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBC's flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: Money Movers provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day's early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: World Of Durian
programme.desc: A program that will review all types of durian typical of the archipelago, starting from the history, taste and specialty of each durian.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. _x000D_An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTN’s production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Dialogue

Under the guidance of the mysterious science teacher Fujitake (Kubota Masataka), who was assigned to the school, they aim to present at an academic conference with an experiment to recreate a Mars crater in the classroom. programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Let's learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery

programme.title: Whiz-Kids TV
programme.desc: Let's cooperate with TV warriors and take on various missions to revive the symbol tree of "Geoworld," a mysterious otherworldly realm rich in nature!

programme.title: Drama 10 "The Classroom Across the Universe" Eps. 9
programme.desc: The story is set in a part-time high school in Shinjuku, Tokyo, where students of different ages and backgrounds, each with diverse circumstances, attend. Under the guidance of the mysterious science teacher Fujitake (Kubota Masataka), who was assigned to the school, they aim to present at an academic conference with an experiment to recreate a Mars crater in the classroom. However, many challenges, including personal obstacles, family troubles, and unbreakable relationships, stand in their way.

programme.title: WARUIKOATSUMARE: For Everyone to Enjoy and Learn about Society
programme.desc: Let's enjoy learning about society with a new educational variety show suitable for children and adults!

programme.title: News Commentary
programme.desc: NHK news commentators give their views on current issues.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: International News Report 2024
programme.desc: An international news program providing in-depth report on what is happening around the world. (Dual audio when available)

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Apprenticing to a Lone Doctor on Niijima (R)
programme.desc: What would I learn if I apprenticed myself to a general physician on an isolated island who faces all kinds of diseases alone? What is the true meaning of his actions like prolonged chats with patients, mysterious notes he handed over, stopping at a park on the way to a medical visit, and snapping a lot of pictures? These brings to light his belief in examining people as well as their illnesses. It also reveals the relationships that inspire the islanders with this way of thinking.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Built on three hills and surrounded by a wall, Siena in central Italy, is a world-famous beautiful city. Its Historic Center dates to the late 13th century and is registered as a World Heritage Site.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Oze National Park contains the largest mountain wetland in Japan. See the beauty of Oze as time-lapse photography makes the flowers and the morning dew come alive.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Akan-Mashu
programme.desc: Akan-Mashu National Park is home to Lake Akan, Lake Kussharo, and Lake Mashu. It provides unique winter sights and the opportunity to experience the indigenous Ainu culture.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions
programme.desc: The stories behind hit Japanese products, plus top creations for niche markets. This time: seismic oil dampers & fabric trim.

programme.title: Bosai:Safe Journey In Japan
programme.desc: The number of visitors to Japan is rising. However, many do not know what to do during an earthquake, tsunami or typhoon. Find out the technologies being developed to protect visitors from disasters.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: A cat hangs out with her owners, a family of surfers who run a beach cafe. This cool cat gets along with her family's dog, too! Next, we meet a shy cat at a surfboard and skateboard shop.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Missing Family With Dementia
programme.desc: In Japan, many people with dementia leave their homes, wander off, and are never seen again. Now, communities are developing measures to locate the missing and reunite them with their loved ones.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Sominsai
programme.desc: This year saw the end of Sominsai, a festival in which loinclothed men plunge into freezing water, are enveloped in smoke, and jostle through the night to grasp a lucky sack as a form of prayer.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Tiny Desk Concerts Japan
programme.desc: Ozawa Kenji, The 30 minute, non stop performance delivers nine beloved tracks in a one take session that filled the NHK office with a roller coaster of emotions from tension and warmth to even tears.

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Today: explaining a need for staffing adjustment. Kaung Htet Paing, from Myanmar, works at Narita Airport. In a roleplay challenge, he reports to a supervisor that a coworker is unwell.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: At a temple once believed to have been home to a dragon, we meet 20 playful cats. They show off their favorite spots and play together. Next, we visit Tokoname and meet a real-life beckoning cat!

programme.desc: This episode highlights Ishida Hiroyasu, a rising star known for his dynamic style and hit film Penguin Highway. Tune in for the full version of Ishida's feature film debut, Sonny Boy & Dewdrop Girl.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: U&I
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.desc: The stories behind hit Japanese products, plus top creations for niche markets. This time: fan-cooled workwear and marine cargo tanks.

programme.title: Bosai: Landslides

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking, we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "It Can't Be Done!"...

programme.title: Paik's Les Miserables - EP 1
programme.desc: 20 contestants will go through a series of grueling missions designed by Paik Jong-won. Who will seize the opportunity to start his own restaurant?

programme.title: Band Of Sisters - EP 37
programme.desc: Eun Hyang shows records of Se Kyung's slush funds to Pil Mo. Dal Hee asks Gye Hwa for a reward after helping her from being thrown out of the house.

programme.title: Band Of Sisters - EP 38
programme.desc: Se Joon encourages Gye Hwa to transfer her building's title deed to Dal Hee. Tae Soo takes revenge on Se Kyung by setting fire to her house.

programme.title: Band Of Sisters - EP 39
programme.desc: Gi Chan decides not to acknowledge Pil Mo as his dad. Se Kyung feels devastated when Eun Hyang accuses her of leaving Yong Ha in the fire to die.

programme.title: Band Of Sisters - EP 40
programme.desc: Se Joon backs up Dal Hee's lie about her pregnancy. To safeguard their interest, Se Kyung and Gye Hwa plan to get rid of Gi Chan once and for all.

programme.title: Paik's Les Miserables - EP 1
programme.desc: 20 contestants will go through a series of grueling missions designed by Paik Jong-won. Who will seize the opportunity to start his own restaurant?

programme.title: The Brave Yongsujung - EP 111
programme.desc: Hye Ra searches for Myung Chul's flash drive with Han Yang's help, while Su Jung seeks evidence from Kelly.

programme.title: The Brave Yongsujung - EP 112
programme.desc: Kyung Hwa's health issues are revealed. Myung Chul becomes suspicious of Young Ae's regular hospital visits.

programme.title: The Brave Yongsujung - EP 113
programme.desc: Chairwoman Hwang regains consciousness. Han Yang aids Hye Ra, and Myung Chul abducts Young Ae.

programme.title: The Brave Yongsujung - EP 114
programme.desc: Woo Jin attempts to dismiss Kyung Hwa, while Myung Chul is caught in the act of kidnapping Young Ae.

programme.title: Teacher Oh Soon Nam - EP 91

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 13
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 13
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 21
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 22
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 70
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 13
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 13
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 14
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 1
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 1
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 1
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 17
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 5
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 6
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion.
