programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai's most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Flash Point
programme.desc: Sergeant Ma Jun is a hot-headed cop who vows to take down three powerful triad drug dealing brothers. His fellow officer, Wilson, is an experienced undercover agent working within the triad gang. They both agree to a partnership, but when Wilson's cover is blown, Jun is forced to confront the gang with the only way he knows - his fists.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: The Conman 2002
programme.desc: Li Ka Shing has lived his entire life as a luckless guy, until he is advised by a master to move his ancestral tomb so as to change his luck. From that day onwards, Li wins at every game in the casino. When his rival uncovers the secret, he destroys Li's ancestral tomb to gain the upper hand. Will Li win the finals of the gambling competition?

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged young and eligible women for Emperor Kangxi's selection. Kangxi is uninterested and becomes bored with the process. He decides to travel incognito as a businessman around the country when he meets Nalan Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man to avoid a possible arranged marriage with the Emperor...

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh
programme.desc: When a young housewife's debt-ridden, philandering husband leaves her with a mountain of tax debts, a security guard is hired by the tax authority to guard the assets, but he starts falling for her instead.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, "The Eagle Shooting Heroes" is loosely based on Louis Cha's classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung's action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: The Sparrow
programme.desc: Kei is an experienced "Sparrow", a pickpocket who likes to take photos of the people and events around him. One day, a mysterious yet beautiful woman, Jenny, appears in his viewfinder and Kei is instantly attracted to her. Jenny's beauty fascinates Kei, but behind this attractive facade lies a mysterious past and a secret mission...

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Miss Du Shi Niang
programme.desc: A famous prostitute Du Shi Niang has always hoped to find her true love in the brothel. Eventually, she meets a handsome student Li Jia and they fall in love at first sight. However, Du Shi Niang is suspicious of him and uses all means to test his love, not knowing that some people are just unable to stand up to the test...

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Winners and Sinners
programme.desc: Five good friends form a cleaning company after they are released from jail. The gangsters encounter a robber while trading banknote printing plate and as the police chases after the robber, he throws the plate into their cleaning cart. Hunted down by the two rival gangs for the plate, the five friends defend themselves with clever tricks.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Mr. Virgin
programme.desc: Mr. Virgin is a romantic comedy about a twenty-nine year-old man Chao Yu-ting (Alfred Chang) who has seemingly been cursed. He becomes paranoid when a Feng Shui expert tells him it will be unlucky for him to marry before the age of thirty... so comical chaos line the days up to his next birthday!

programme.title: In Laws, Out Laws
programme.desc: When priceless antiques were found in the backyard of Auntie Kang's home, the family finds themselves becoming sudden millionaires. Their arguments and disagreements lead to hilarious results as each of Auntie Kang's sons tries his darnedest to get the biggest shares!

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chu's family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her...

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Long's wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident...

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fete. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu's lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li's father...

programme.title: Legend of the Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancee Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case...

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General's henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper's daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother's death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the "walls"?

programme.title: Cupid's Kitchen - EP 39
programme.desc: Lin Kesong (Song Zu Er) pursues a guy she likes all the way to the US. Having an acute sense of taste, she meets renowned Michelin-certified chef Jiang Qianfan (Ethan Juan), who takes her in as a disciple. However, she does not have any talent in cooking.

programme.title: In The Storm - EP 14
programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.

programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.
